title: Interaction Analysis Between Multimedia Production Competencies and Instructional Design Decisions

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Developing multimedia integration skills for designing social studies educational content by professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze multimedia selection decisions in the instructional design process and suggest improvement strategies
Learners can derive optimal design strategies by comparing decision-making patterns of expert and novice instructional designers
Learners can evaluate and incorporate the impact of employer requirements on instructional design decisions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
